criteria.criterion: Directory organized and files named correctly
HTML successfully validates as XHTML 1.0 Strict or HTML 5
CSS successfully validates as CSS 2.1 or CSS 3.0
HTML tags match the nature of the content
Class names & id's used properly and only when necessary
Layout elements present and properly placed in HTML
Layout elements styled for accurate positions
Layout elements styled for proper backgrounds & borders
All anchors, including navigation, styled properly on hover
Navigation menu correctly styled for the current page
Fonts styled accurately for size, weight & family
